[War](War.html) and peace  
Inventions of 11000BC / 4200 BC [massacre](war) (State organized)  

Up until the end of the [Ubaid](Ubaid.html) period, There were very few signs of any violence and cities have no walls  
The exceptionally beautiful pottery of the Ubaid period is replaced with harsh functional pottery in the Uruk period
